select count(*) from EA_PLIST where EP_USER=#{id}

select * from (select rownum EP_NUM, p.EP_KIND, p.EP_USER, p.EP_SELLER, p.EB_BOARDNUM, p.EB_ITEMNUM, p.EB_ITEMNAME, p.EB_FILE, p.EP_PRICE, p.EP_DATE, p.EP_RESULT, d.ED_COMPANY, d.ED_DELINUM from EA_PLIST p full outer join EA_DELIVERY d on p.EB_ITEMNUM = d.EB_ITEMNUM where EP_USER=#{id} order by EP_DATE desc) where EP_NUM >= ((#{page}-1)*#{limit} +1) and EP_NUM <= (#{page} *#{limit})
mapper.update: update ea_member set em_count = em_count + 1 where em_id=#{id}
update ea_board set eb_audate = TO_DATE(#{eb_stdate}, 'RR-MM-DDHH24:MI:SS') + 1, eb_ladate = TO_DATE(#{eb_stdate}, 'RR-MM-DDHH24:MI:SS') + 7 where eb_itemnum = #{eb_itemnum}
mapper.select: select em_pass from ea_member where em_id = #{id}
mapper.update: update ea_member set em_phone=#{em_phone}, em_email=#{em_email}, em_post=#{em_post}, em_address1=#{em_address1}, em_address2=#{em_address2}, em_intro=#{em_intro}, em_bank=#{em_bank}, em_account=#{em_account} where em_id = #{em_id}
mapper.select: select * from ( select rownum ea_num, a.ea_kind, b.eb_file, a.ea_user, a.eb_itemnum, b.eb_itemname, b.eb_laprice, a.ea_date from ea_attent a , ea_board b where a.eb_itemnum = b.eb_itemnum) where ea_num >= ((#{page}-1)*#{limit} +1) and ea_num <= (#{page} *#{limit}) and ea_user=#{id} order by ea_date desc
